function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dominance of environmental quality theme in COVID-19 and cities research","Impact":"Limited understanding of socio-economic impacts and transportation issues related to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure balanced research coverage of all themes to understand comprehensive impact of contagious diseases in urban areas","Technologies":"Text mining and bibliometric analysis tools to identify research gaps","People":"Researchers, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Air quality impacts of pandemic-induced lockdowns","Impact":"Limited understanding of the long-term effects of transportation policy interventions on urban air quality","Mitigation":"Conduct long-term studies to assess the impact of transportation policy interventions on air quality","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, data analysis tools","People":"Environmental scientists, policymakers","Owner":"Environmental research organizations"}]}
